name: coeq12i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: eqtri(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c2, c3), ccom(c2, c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c2, c3))
-| wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c2, c1))
-| wceq(ccom(c2, c1), ccom(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c2, c3))
-| wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c2, c1))
-| wceq(ccom(c2, c1), ccom(c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c2, c3))
-| wceq(ccom(c2, c1), ccom(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)

body.origin:
|- wceq(ccom(c2, c1), ccom(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c1, c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wceq(c1, c3)

comment: Equality inference for composition of two classes. (Contributed by FL, 7-Jun-2012.)
